baseline_groups.claim_summary: Higher corp tax rate reduces foreign sales ratio of US MNE affiliates by ~0.57pp.
baseline_groups.notes: Single baseline specification from Table 2 of Laffitte and Toubal (2022). Panel FE with country + industry + year FE, controls for log GDP per capita, log distance, and common language, clustered at country level. Analysis uses simulated data calibrated to match the paper findings.

global_notes: This specification search uses SIMULATED data (not original BEA data), so coefficient magnitudes are calibrated approximations rather than true replications. 64 total specifications. Some leave-one-out control specs produce coefficients identical to baseline, suggesting orthogonal simulated controls. Alternative treatment specs (tax_haven, low_tax_15, low_tax_20, low_tax_25) use different treatment definitions with positive expected signs and different FE structures (no country FE).
